alert.note: Alert for Hutchinson; Moore; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 11:59PM CDT until April 28 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Western Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northwest of Sanford, or 14 miles northwest of Borger, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Dumas, Borger, Cactus, Fritch, Sunray, Stinnett, Sanford, Four Way, Lake Meredith and Pringle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
